The Forest of Knives in Madagascar is a UNESCO World Heritage Site...
...located in the Melaky region in northwest Madagascar,...
...and it houses an impressive number of endemic species of both plants and animals.
The bizarre geomorphology and the natural processes...
...that shape the rocks in such a way...
...have been the subject of much research over the years,...
...but now tourists can enjoy safely hiking around...
If you're sick of spending time by the beach...
...Madagascar is definitely the choice for you.
